name: Cunning Flyers
description:
Falling was never so fun. You are falling from the sky and only have your surfing board at your rescue.

[How to Play]
Tap Tap Tap.
Tap screen anywhere to change the direction.

[Twist]
Avoiding obstacles wont give you points, the only way to score is by collecting coins.

[Caution]
Don't try to collect every coin if you want to survive. Watch out for the inertia, it can drive you crazy.

[Disclaimer]
Play at your own risk, one mistake and game over. Good Luck!!
